channel.title: Autoing on 2 accounts
channel.description: hey i read the tutorial in the scar faq and downloaded windows 98 and virtual pc installed scar and srl and got rs client but i have a problem the screen resouloution will only let me keep it on the biggest size for 32bit anything smaller it goes to 16bit and wont let me change problem though because on the bigges resoulution i cant see the entire rs screen all in one only like 85% of it and the uther 15% you have to scroll down to see that is a problem with the bot as it needs to see the entire screen does anyone know anyway i can switch to smaller size and keep 32bit? it would be much appreciated

item.title: Autoing on 2 accounts
item.dc:creator: @Hellfish Hellfish
item.description:
@Hellfish wrote:

Cheesehunk:

Whats wrong with using one account? Maybe that’s just my theory because I can’t help with the problem…

Follow him ^^

And everything will be ok! Or get another computer!

Read full topic

item.title: Autoing on 2 accounts
item.dc:creator: @Hellfish Hellfish
item.description:
@Hellfish wrote:

Virtual PC sucks!! I hate it. It does resizing for you. Using Virtual PC with two monitors may work! Otherwise just wait until SCAR evolves!

Read full topic
